name: Magic: The Gathering Arena

task.description: Installing .NET 4.7.2. This will take a while...
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- setup: https://mtgarena.downloads.wizards.com/Live/Windows32/versions/2088.756640/MTGAInstaller_0.1.2088.756640.msi
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Wizards of the Coast/MTGA/MTGA.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: GrabFullscreen
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: Y
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: UseTakeFocus
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: N
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    arch: win32
    description: Installing .NET 4.7.2. This will take a while...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xact arial win10
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- copy:
    dst: $CACHE/mtg-arena/
    src: setup
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /i "$CACHE/mtg-arena/MTGAInstaller_0.1.2088.756640.msi" /q
    description: Installing Magic the Gathering Arena
    exclude_processes: mscorsvw.exe rundll32.exe MTGA.exe UnityCrashHandler32.exe
    executable: msiexec
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  esync: true
